text: Nikhwambusia Abaana ba Israil Inyanza, ne Firauni nende omukanda kukwe kwabalwani nabalondakhwo khububii nende khubusuku. Ukhula shingala Firauni yanyoolwa nende lifwa liokhusishibwa mumatsi , naboola mbu; “ Esuubile mbu abulaho Nyasaye wundi halali wa Abana ba Isaril basuubila nasi endi halala mubandu balia abehotselesia.”
